channel.title: Introduction on Chin Yi Tan Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Chin Yi Tan Personal Website

item.description: Research # I have done research in various field of Physics in the last couple of years. Modelling a strong gravitational lenses # I am currently building an automated pipeline to model 160 strong gravitational lenses using their HST image. The model parameters obtained can be used to determine the inner slope of the dark matter profile in elliptical galaxies and aid in the measurement of the Hubble constant.

Physics Notes # I plan to rederived the main equations in physics from experiments. Topics I plan to cover includes: Classical Mechanics Electromagnetism and Light Atomic Theory and Thermal Physics Special and General Relativity Quantum Mechanics In the mean time, here is a picture of Torchic, the fire chick Pokemon.
